verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord, God of my salvation,
Turn Your ear to me
My God, Sovereign of all creation,
I have come to give you praise
And with the life Youâ€™ve given me
I lift up my voice and sing

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are Holy, You are Holy
My lips pour out Your deserving praise
You are Holy, The One and Only God
King of Glory, Father of Grace

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh Lord, You clothe my heart in beauty
with the blood of Calvary
Now Your love, Your life, Your Holy Presence
has become the air I breathe
You are the joy of the redeemed
The hope and the life, we sing
